metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare Workers |  Build and deploy code with Easy-to Use Developer Tools
metaTags.metaDescription: Build great software while Cloudflare manages the overhead of configuring and maintaining the infrastructure.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Workers
relatedBlades.subtitle: Run serverless code with exceptional performance, reliability, and scale.
relatedBlades.copy: Build serverless functions and applications without configuring or maintaining infrastructure with global deployment to over %{DataCenterCount} data centers around the world on Cloudflare's global network.

columnContent.title: Increase developer productivity
columnContent.description: Spin up applications in hours not days with no tuning necessary. Code is automatically placed for optimal performance.

columnContent.title: Scale automatically
columnContent.description: No action is required from developers to add more compute power or worry about reaching a limit no matter how much traffic an application receives.

columnContent.title: Improve reliability
columnContent.description: Gradually deploy code change to improve reliability and catch errors before they impact end users.

relatedBlades.title: Run serverless code from region: Earth
relatedBlades.copy: To enable industry-leading performance automatically, Cloudflare Workers runs on V8 isolates not containers.  Our V8 isolate architecture enables instant start up times at no additional cost as there is no delay waiting for the runtime to be loaded into an instance upon initiation. Isolates already have the runtime, all that is needed is for the code to be loaded on invocation, virtually eliminating cold starts on requests.

relatedBlades.description: Learn how to build a global API gateway with Workers.

content.value: We need exceptionally strong security for our customers who upload private app code to Docker Hub. Cloudflare Workers provides an authentication layer that ensures that anyone who tries to access user data is authorized to do so.

relatedBlades.title: Focus on your code and innovate faster.

columnContent.title: Run serverless functions
columnContent.description: From fast and light to longer running and more CPU-intensive workloads, deploy and execute code globally.

columnContent.title: Build frontend applications
columnContent.description: Upload and serve HTML, CSS and client-side JS with native support for static files.

columnContent.title: Observability and troubleshooting
columnContent.description: Collect, filtersearch, and query Workers logs to troubleshoot and resolve problems faster.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore use cases
